about_the_game:
Core Gameplay

Step into a game that perfectly mixes horror with a first-person shooter perspective. Complete technical puzzles, fight your way through tough environments filled with enemies, and find out just what has been happening here.

The Background

You play as Kyle East, a middle-aged freelance journalist who lives a very average life. Your goal is to investigate the Walker family’s mansion located in a small forest in Eastend so that you can write a viral news story that could forever change your career.


The mansion was built by the members of the immortal ancient village that have been living off the grid for several centuries. It is believed that the mansion is much vaster in size than it appears on the outside, spanning deep underground.


Find The Darkness

What will you find in the mansion? Are you alone? Will you be able to find out what has been going on there? The darkness is waiting for you, don’t leave it waiting or it’ll find you. There's plenty to explore, investigate and kill.

Gameplay Features

The game favors core gameplay features such as:


  • Weaponry, such as guns.
  • Inventory management.
  • Story-driven narrative to keep the player engaged.
  • Immersive graphics and environments for added realism.
  • Deep Learning Super Sampling, High Fidelity FX Super Resolution (fallback).
  • Raytraced lighting and reflections.
  • Cloud saving and modification.

content_descriptors.notes:
Realistic bloodshed.
Realistic violence.
No profanity or nudity.

short_description: Close your eyes. Step into a world filled with nothing but darkness and terror, where everything wants to destroy you. Your time has come to fight the shrieking darkness, be brave and don't look back or you won't make it.
